jobDescription:
Title: .Net Developer

Company is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without
regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, or national origin.
Summary:  The work includes a variety of different feature sets using API’s, Power Platform, Dataverse, and standard C#
development.  The team this individual will be joining will be able to move in between different technologies to develop
feature sets that integrate within our Dynamics instance.  It’s a lot of Microsoft potpourri from .NET, Azure, Power
Platform, and Dynamics configuration.
 
Technical Profile:
 .NET Generalist with strong preference for experience writing/using web services.  See above for more detail.
 Preferred: Well-rounded developer (e.g. integration, back-end, front-end), SQL, React and Appian experience is
a plus.
 Nice to have: Power Platform (Power BI, Power Apps, Power Automate)
 Ok to have but not primary: SSRS, MVC, CA Autosys, JavaScript frameworks (Angular, etc.)
 Experience with Test Driven Development
 Exposure to Entity Framework or other ORM
 
Qualities needed:
 Good communicator who wants to work in a team environment, comfortable performing pair programming
 Analytical – not afraid to dive into complex code and data to troubleshoot issues
 Creative problem solver who is automation focused – we’re looking to not have recurring work come back to us,
but to better automate or teach/train users for self service
 Motivated by small quick wins and process improvement
 Comfortable working in an agile environment.  Prefer experience working in Agile
 
Benefits to being placed at Company:
 Contract with potential for extended renewals
 Team focused environment.  We treat our consultants as part of the team.
 Rich developer community with lunch & learns on best practices.  Focus on software artisanship.
 A DevOps culture. We use automated deployment and are constantly looking to improve in the DevOps space.
Our DBAs/App Admins are part of our collaboration.
 Agile/lean practices with diversity of projects
 
Things to note:
 A background check will need to be completed by your firm prior to the start of the assignment within our
guidelines.  Once starting, contractors will need to be entered into our Workday HRIS system for business
continuity purposes.
